lang::Converter Class Reference
[Language support library]

#include <Converter.h>

Inheritance diagram for lang::Converter:

[legend]
List of all members.

Detailed Description

Character encoding/decoding interface.

Converts to/from Unicode code points.


Public Member Functions

virtual bool decode (const void *src, const void *srcend, int *srcbytes, int *dst) const =0
 Decodes bytes to single Unicode code point.
virtual bool encode (void *dst, void *dstend, int *dstbytes, int src) const =0
 Encodes single Unicode code point to bytes.

Member Function Documentation

virtual bool lang::Converter::decode (  const void *  src,
const void *  srcend,
int *  srcbytes,
int *  dst
)  const [pure virtual]
 

Decodes bytes to single Unicode code point.

Ignores invalid input byte sequences.

Parameters:
src Ptr to the source data.
srcend Ptr to the end of source data.
srcbytes [out] Receives number of bytes decoded.
dst [out] Receives decoded Unicode code point (if byte sequence was not malformed).
Returns:
false if decoded byte sequence was malformed.

Implemented in lang::UTFConverter.

virtual bool lang::Converter::encode (  void *  dst,
void *  dstend,
int *  dstbytes,
int  src
)  const [pure virtual]
 

Encodes single Unicode code point to bytes.

Parameters:
dst Destination buffer which receives encoded byte sequence.
dstend End of the destination buffer.
dstbytes [out] Receives number of bytes encoded.
src Unicode code point to encode.
Returns:
false if the code point couldn't be encoded.

Implemented in lang::UTFConverter.
